called-by-name.context: God singles out Bezalel for the sacred work
called-by-name.english: See, I have singled out by name Bezalel

filled-with-spirit.context: God fills Bezalel with divine skill
filled-with-spirit.hebrew: וָאֲמַלֵּא אֹתוֹ רוּחַ אֱלֹהִים בְּחָכְמָה וּבִתְבוּנָה וּבְדַעַת
filled-with-spirit.english: I have endowed him with a divine spirit of skill, ability, and knowledge

every-kind-of-craft.english: To work in every kind of craft

gold-silver-copper.english: To make designs for work in gold, silver, and copper

wisdom-of-heart.english: He has filled them with wisdom of heart

to-give-directions.english: And to give directions, He put it in his heart
